front.title: Handover Key Management and Re-authentication Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document describes the Handover Keying (HOKEY) problem statement. The current EAP keying framework is not designed to support re-authentication and handovers. This often cause unacceptable latency in various mobile wireless environments. HOKEY plans to address these HOKEY plans to address these problems by implementing a generic mechanism to reuse derived EAP keying material for hand-off.
